name: Mapfy
author: Jewel Theme

sections.description:
WordPress Google Maps Plugin for showing Google Maps on website.

Source Code

Mapfy is built with LeafletJS, an open-source JavaScript library for mobile-friendly interactive maps.

3rd Party Services

Get User IP: https://icanhazip.com
LeafletJS: LeafletJS
OpenStreetMap: OpenStreetMap
WorldImagery: WorldImagery
Stamen Design: Stamen Design

PRIVACY POLICY

Mapfy collects some telemetry data upon user‚Äôs confirmation. This helps us to troubleshoot problems faster & make product improvements.

Mapfy does not gather any data by default. The only starts gathering basic telemetry data when a user allows it via the admin notice. We collect the data to ensure a great user experience for all our users.

We DO NOT IMMEDIATELY start gathering data, without confirmation from users in any case.

Learn more about how we collect and uses this data.

Support

Support Forum
Pre-Sale Questions

‚úãWant More –

If you like our Mapfy plugin then why not check some other plugins that developed by us:

üöÄ WP Adminify: – The best WordPress Dashboard Customization plugin available in the market. With this plugin you will get 18+ modules like Dark Mode, Menu Editor, Folders, Dashboard Widget Manager, Login Customizer, Admin Columns, Activity Logs and many more.

üöÄ Master Blocks: – “Master Blocks” is a powerful WordPress plugin designed to enhance the functionality of the Gutenberg block editor. With this plugin, users can unlock a wide range of new blocks, offering greater flexibility and creativity when designing and customising their website’s content.

üöÄ Master Addons: – One of the best Elementor Addon plugin that packed with 70+ elements and extensions. You will get all essential elements to design any type Website.

üö¥üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Image Comparison for Elementor: – This plugin dedicatedly made for image comparison element. You will get a multiple variation for image comparison. Showcase your before after work easily with the help of this plugin.

üç° Master Accordion: – If you are a default WordPress user and need a proper accordion plugin then Master Accordion is for you. You can add as much accordion as you need in multiple way.

üèï WordPress prettyPhoto: – This plugin helps you to enable lightbox for your any media file, flash, YouTube, iframes and ajax. Just enable PreetyPhoto in your desired media file and you are done.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the Downloaded “mapfy.zip” Folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Or, UNZIP “mapfy.zip” folder and Upload mapfy on “wp-content/plugins/” folder via FTP or Copy and
    Paste on your Local Computer

Liked Mapfy Plugins?

Rate us on WordPress Forum üôÇ

screenshots.caption: Mapfy: Feature-rich mapping with multi-marker and image tooltips.
Explore diverse map styles and variations within the Mapfy plugin.
Locate and personalize your maps with the search and custom marker upload feature in Mapfy.
Mapfy offers a perfect map option with a single marker and textual tooltip for simplicity.

mapfy/mapfy.name: mapfy/mapfy
mapfy/mapfy.title: Mapfy - Map Block
mapfy/mapfy.description: Allows embed maps in your contents, good alternative to Google Maps without the need for api key
